resources.string: It seems Google Play Services is not available on this mobile device. Muun needs it to send push notifications for Lightning payments. Please, install Google Play Services and try again.
The Android notification service is not responding. Please try again.
Scan a bitcoin or lightning QR code
Enable your camera to scan QR codes with addresses or invoices
Enter a bitcoin address or invoice
You are about to cancel this payment and go back to the home screen
This payment may take longer than most lightning payments. Why?
Why will this payment take longer?
This lightning payment requires a confirmed on-chain transaction. It takes an average of 10 minutes to confirm.
You don\’t have enough funds to cover this payment and the network fee.
This invoice was created by a private node that can\'t be reached. To reach it, the invoice must include extra data (RouteHints). This issue can only be fixed by the invoice creator.
There\'s no route with enough capacity to make this payment. Please, reach out to our support team and let us know what happened. We’ll be happy to help.
This payment needs a longer expiration time
Please request a new invoice with an expiration time of at least one hour, or try scanning an invoice with a smaller amount.
This invoice expired before the payment was made. Please, create or request a new one.
This invoice has already been used
This invoice has already been scanned or paid by another wallet. Please create or request a new one.
This invoice doesn\’t include an amount
At the moment, you can only pay to invoices that include an amount. Please, create or request a new one.
Your payment was not completed because bitcoin exchange rates changed since you started. Please start a new payment.
Something went wrong, but we don’t know what. Please, reach out to our support team and let us know what happened. We’ll be happy to help.
You can’t pay an invoice to yourself.
The receiving wallet can\'t process lightning payments right now, so the payment has failed.
Something went wrong, but we couldn\'t identify the cause. We created an error report that will help us find it. \n\n Please, send the report to our team.
The amount you are trying too send is too small. It must be greater than 546 satoshis.
This is not a BTC address

This is not a BTC address or a lightning invoice. Double-check its source and make sure the address is properly formatted. 
 
Scanned text: 
placeholder
This is not a BTC address
This is not a BTC address or a lightning invoice. Double-check its source and make sure the address is properly formatted.

It doesn't seem to be one. Please, double-check its source. Keep in mind you can only use LNURL with services that support it. 
 
Scanned text: 
placeholder
This is a valid LNURL, but not for this operation. Please, double-check its source.
The service that created the LNURL code is unavailable. Please, try again later.

Something failed and we aren't sure what it was. Please send us a report to help us find out what happened. 
 
RECEIVED MESSAGE: 
placeholder

Your lightning invoice expired, and placeholder didn't complete the payment. Please, contact them for more information. 
 
USED INVOICE: 
placeholder
The LNURL expired before the payment was made. Please, request a new one.
There are no funds to withdraw
It seems you don\'t have any funds to withdraw from service. Please, check that your balance isn\'t empty.
It seems service couldn\'t find a route to send you the payment. We suggest you contact service to let them know.
Waiting for the recipient to accept the payment.
This payment is waiting for an on-chain confirmation.
There was no available route for this payment. You will get the refund in approximately %d hours (%d blocks).
This payment failed. You received a refund.
This lightning payment involves an on-chain transaction. To complete the payment, the transaction must be confirmed.
Receive your first payment and get it started!
Your payment history will appear here
Enable contacts to send money to your friends using your phone number and contact list.
Open your wallet to see the details
Your payment is on the way
You\'ll receive your payment as soon as %s completes it.
Your lightning invoice expired, and %s didn\'t complete the payment.
Open Muun to receive a payment
Someone sent you Bitcoin via lightning network. Tap here to receive it.

Can\'t connect to Muun\'s server. This is usually something temporary and self-healing. Wait a couple of seconds, check your Internet connection and try again. If the problem persists, please do contact support@muun.com for help.
Enter your phone number and country to receive a verification code. Carrier rates may apply
Why are we asking for this?
Muun makes it easy to pay by using your phone number and contact list. People who already know how to contact you by phone will be able to easily pay you with Muun.
You will receive an authorization email at placeholder. Please click the link in the email to continue.
You will receive a verification code via SMS
You chose it when you set up your wallet.
Your full name and picture are only visible to your contacts
Your full name and picture will be visible only to people who already have your phone number in their contact list.
Reminder: it had at least 8 characters. This was the only restriction.
You haven’t finished recovering your wallet. You can do this later.
You created a new wallet.\nWelcome to Muun!
This is not a bitcoin address or lightning invoice.
You\'ll send funds to your Muun wallet
To continue using Muun, please update the app to the latest version.
It will take just a few minutes
To continue using Muun, please restart the app and recover your wallet.
New features and fixes are waiting!
Use your email and a password to conveniently recover your wallet if you change your phone or reinstall Muun.

Use your email and a password to conveniently recover your wallet if you change your phone or reinstall Muun. \n\n This enables multi-factor authentication, improving security when you use your Recovery Code.
Your password won\'t work unless you finish.
Are you sure you don\'t want email recovery?
You can come back later if you change your mind.
You will receive a verification link. How will Muun use my email?
I don\'t want to use my email
How will Muun use my email?
Muun will send you an email every time somebody tries to access your wallet, asking for your authorization. This protects you from people (or computers) attempting to guess your password.
Choose something memorable. If possible, avoid old passwords you\'re already using.

string.name: create_email_help_content
string.annotation: Another wallet is already using this email
If you need help, please reach out to our support team and let us know what happened. We’ll be happy to help.

resources.string: You will receive a verification email at %s. Click the link in the email to continue.

string.name: setup_password_accept_why
string.annotation: Why can\'t Muun reset my password?

resources.string: I understand I will need my password and access to my email to recover my wallet.
I understand that Muun can\'t reset my password if I forget it.
Why can\'t Muun reset my password?
Your password is used to encrypt your wallet backup, so nobody without the password can access it — not even Muun. If you lose your original password, the backup is impossible to decrypt and restore.
You backed up your wallet, and can now recover it using your email and password.
Write down a code on paper to recover your wallet if you forget your password.
Write down a code on paper to recover your wallet if you change your phone or reinstall Muun.
Use pen and paper. For security, don\'t save this on your phone or in the cloud.
I understand I will need my Recovery Code if I forget my password.
I understand I will need my Recovery Code to recover my wallet.
I understand Muun doesn\'t keep a copy of my Recovery Code, and it can\'t be changed.
You can now recover your wallet using your email and Recovery Code.
You backed up your wallet, and can now recover it using your Recovery Code.
To continue, you first need to set up your Recovery Code.
There\'s an invalid character in this code
Your Recovery Code won\'t work unless you finish.
Send us any ideas, comments or problems you have. We read them all!
If you have any ideas, comments or problems write us at support@muun.com.
You will need your password or Recovery Code to regain access.
You can\'t log out at this moment
Payments you received are pending confirmation. Before logging out, wait for them to confirm.
You will lose your transaction history.
We\'re sorry to see you go! We would love to know why. Reach out to our support team and let us know.
You can\'t delete your wallet at this moment
You need to empty your wallet. Make a payment using all your funds, and try again when the transaction has 6 confirmations.
Your password is used for security. \nTo change it, you need access to your email and your current password or Recovery Code.
Your Emergency Kit is a PDF document with information and instructions to independently transfer your funds.
Your private keys are securely encrypted with your Recovery Code, so you can save it in the cloud.
By combining the Emergency Kit and your Recovery Code, you will have total, undisputed control over your funds.
Why are my Private Keys encrypted?

Your Private Keys are encrypted to give you better security. It prevents you from exposing them on a piece of paper, and allows you to store them online safely. 
 
In Muun, you can recover access to your wallet by clicking on an email and entering your password. Private Keys are only expected to be used in edge cases where Muun is not able to cooperate. 
 
For that case, we have built an open-source tool that lets you decrypt and sweep your keys.
An error occurred while preparing your private keys. Try again later.
Use the Recovery Tool to retrieve your money

In a scenario where Muun is unavailable, this is the way to reclaim all your money without the collaboration of our servers. 

Use your Private Keys, your Recovery Code and the Recovery Tool to retrieve your funds. 

You can find our Recovery Tool and the instructions for this process at
As a security measure, you were logged out. Sign back in to continue.
I understand that my previous password is no longer valid.
Your new password won\'t work unless you finish.
Use your new password to recover your wallet.
Super hiper mega Random name which happens to also be extremely and utterly looong and includes a extra little last name :)
The phone numbers of your contacts are never sent to Muun.
Only the hashes of phone numbers are sent to Muun, but never the numbers themselves. By matching these hashes, your friends using Muun will appear as contacts.
You don\’t have contacts using Muun yet. You\'ll find them here when they enable their contacts.
Muun requires the Contacts permission in order to display your contacts, but it has been permanently denied. \n\n Please go to the app settings menu, select Permissions, and enable Contacts.
Sorry! Muun is not available in that country yet.
This version is too old. You need to update your Muun app.
Another wallet is already using this email
Your session has expired. Please contact support@muun.com.
Your verification code has expired. We\'re sending you a new one
Wrong Recovery Code. Please try again.
This bitcoin address or lightning invoice is invalid
The provided payment details are invalid
The image could not be read
Wrong verification code. Please try again.
Another wallet is already using this phone number
This is an old verification code. Please try the last one you received
Too many failed attempts. You will receive a new code
The provided payment details are invalid
Sorry! This lightning invoice is not supported yet.
An error occurred. Please try again
Something went wrong but we don\'t know what. We created an error report that we can use to help you. Please send it to support@muun.com.
We created an error report that we can use to help you. Please send it to support@muun.com.
You can copy the error report and send it to us using another method.
There\'s no web browser app installed.

Muun calculates and suggests the optimal fee needed to confirm your transaction in less than 30 minutes. 

A higher fee gives more priority to your transaction, while a transaction with a lower fee may take hours to confirm. 

Optimal fees rise when there is more activity on the network. If fees increase while your transaction is still unconfirmed, it may take longer to get confirmed.

Satoshis per virtual byte (sat/vbyte) is the unit to measure the priority of a transaction. 

A higher fee gives more priority to your transaction, while a payment with a lower fee may take several hours to confirm. 

Fees rise when there is more activity on the network. If fees increase while your payment is still unconfirmed, it may take longer to get confirmed.
This transaction may take days to confirm.
Enter a fee lower than %s sat/vbyte.
Because you are using all your funds, the fee is deducted from the total amount you are sending.
Because you are using all your funds, changing the fee will modify the transaction amount.
The bitcoin network is experiencing unusually high traffic and rejecting transactions with fee rates below %s sat/vbyte.
Enter a fee higher than %s sat/vbyte.
Not enough funds to pay for the optimal network fee. Select a network fee to continue.
Please enable notifications to know when you receive bitcoin.
Lightning payments require you to get notifications.

Muun requires the Notifications permission for you to correcly receive payments, but it has been permanently denied. \n\nPlease go to the app settings menu, select Permissions, and enable Notifications.
This invoice expired before the payment was made. Please, create or request a new one.
Your wallet is temporarily unable to receive Lightning payments due to the high congestion of the Bitcoin Network. \n\n To receive a payment, please switch to the Bitcoin tab.

Your wallet is temporarily unable to receive Lightning payments due to the high congestion of the Bitcoin Network. \n\n To receive a payment, please visit Settings > Lightning Network and set Bitcoin as your receiving protocol.
Your phone\'s secure storage has been corrupted or compromised. For security reasons, Muun has logged you out. Please contact support@muun.com for help.
Your phone\'s secure storage has been corrupted or compromised. Muun can\'t continue working in this conditions. Please contact support@muun.com for help.
Create a recovery method in case you change your phone or reinstall Muun.
Use your email and a password to recover your wallet.
You can use placeholder and your password to recover your wallet.
Write down a code on paper in case you forget your password.
Write down a code on paper for additional security.
Write down a code on paper to recover your wallet.
You can use the code you wrote down to recover your wallet.
You can use placeholder and the code you wrote down to recover your wallet.
Save the information you need to recover your money without using Muun.
Follow the instructions in the kit you saved to recover your money without using Muun.
You wrote down your Private Keys. Use them with your Recovery Code and the Recovery tool to recover your funds without using Muun.
Your wallet is not backed up
Your wallet has a basic backup
You\'re one step away from a complete setup
We recommend using cloud storage, to ensure your kit is never lost. Is that safe?
Can\'t use Drive: no internet connection
Enter the verification code located in the top-right corner of the document, just to ensure everything went right.
This is an old code. Check your latest Emergency Kit\n(your code starts with %s)
The verification code is a 6-digit number, located at the top-right corner of your Emergency Kit.
If you can’t find your Emergency Kit, save it again.
You saved your kit to Google Drive. Before you go, find it and take a good look inside. Make sure you can do this in the future.
You have complete, undisputed ownership of your bitcoin.
You haven’t finished exporting up your Emergency Kit. You can restart this setup later.
Your Emergency Kit could not be saved
We couldn\’t upload your Emergency Kit to the cloud. Please, check your connection and try again.
Saving the kit manually?\nHere\’s some advice.
Make it accesible. You should be able to access your Kit at all times, even if your phone is lost, stolen or stops working.
Don\’t prioritize secrecy. Remember, your kit is encrypted. Without your Recovery Code, the Kit is harmless.
Make it easy to update. You should always have the latest Kit at hand, an old Kit won\’t work.
The authorization failed because the link you used expired. Click the link in the latest email you received.
The authorization failed because the link you used is invalid. Click the link in the latest email you received.
The verification failed because the link you used expired. Click the link in the latest email you received.
The verification failed because the link you used is invalid. Click the link in the latest email you received.
The authorization failed because the link you used expired. Click the link in the latest email you received.
The authorization failed because the link you used is invalid. Click the link in the latest email you received.
The Recovery Code is a set of randomly-generated characters that is used to create an encrypted backup of your Private Keys.
Wrong Recovery Code. Please review it and try again.
Emergency kit save in the device failed. Please try again or contact us.
This Recovery Code can\'t be used without \n entering your email first.
Use your Google account to save and access your kit.
Tell us which cloud service you would like us to support.
We plan to support more cloud services. Which one would you like to see added?

string.name: save_link_manual
string.annotation: I don\’t want to use cloud storage

resources.string: Failed to update wallet. Please try again.
Back up your wallet. Create a back-up to never lose access to your wallet.
Welcome to your new homescreen!\nTap or swipe up to see your transactions.
Until confirmed, this transaction can be canceled by the sender. How?.
How can this transaction be canceled?

This transaction has RBF (replace-by-fee) enabled. RBF allows the sender to raise the original fee for faster confirmation, but they can also use it to cancel the transaction. Unless you know and trust the sender, consider it a risk until the transaction is confirmed.
Learn more about the trade-offs of turbo channels.
Receiving some lightning payments will take much longer.
Use LNURL to receive payments without having to share invoices. You can only use it with other services that support it.
Scan an LNURL QR to receive bitcoin
This seems like a LNURL code. It allows you to receive bitcoin via lightning, instead of sending it. Do you want to use it?
placeholder is taking too long to pay
You can choose to wait here or leave, and receive a notification when the payment completes. If the payment doesn\'t complete, please contact placeholder.
The service that created this code is not available in your country.
This code was used by another wallet, and can\'t be used again.
Taproot is one of the most anticipated upgrades in bitcoin. \n\n Starting with cheaper and less traceable payments, Taproot is setting the stage for massive innovation in bitcoin.
Taproot uses new scripts to create the addresses where you\'ll receive funds. \n\n To recover those funds in an emergency, these scripts need to be included in your Emergency Kit.
Keep total control over your funds by updating your Emergency Kit before ever using Taproot. \n\n The updated Kit replaces the one you already have, but your Recovery Code doesn\'t change.
You haven\'t activated Taproot yet. You can restart this process later.
Choose your preferred cloud service to ensure your Kit is never lost.
You can now send and receive payments using Taproot addresses. Your payments will be cheaper and less traceable.

Taproot is a new address type that makes your payments cheaper and less traceable. \n \nMany services are not yet compatible with Taproot and may label your addresses as invalid. If you make Taproot the default, you\'ll need to manually change the address type to Segwit or Legacy every time this happens.
Some services may label your addresses as invalid.
The most widely accepted address type. Use it only when a service labels your Segwit addresses as invalid.
A relatively new address type, already widely accepted. It creates lighter transactions and saves you money on future network fees.
Activates in ~x hours. The newest and most powerful address type. Many services are not yet compatible and may label it as invalid.
The newest and most powerful address type. Many services are not yet compatible and may label it as invalid.
Level-up your payments . Save with each payment by activating Taproot.

string.name: taproot_success_preactivated_desc
string.annotation: In 123 blocks (~4 hours), the Bitcoin Network will activate Taproot globally.
When this happens, you\'ll be able to receive funds in Taproot addresses.

resources.string: You can now send and receive payments using Taproot addresses. Your payments will be cheaper and less traceable.

string.name: tr_clock_detail_desc
string.annotation: When the Bitcoin Network mines block 709,632 Taproot will activate globally.
To protect you from potential blockchain reorganizations, you\'ll be able to start using Taproot addresses 6 blocks later

resources.string: Save with each payment by activating Taproot.
The Bitcoin Network activated Taproot. You can now enjoy cheaper payments.
You are about to create an encrypted backup of your private key. To save it, you need an internet connection. \n\n Please check your connection and try again.
Your Recovery Code is used to create an encrypted backup of your private key. To save the backup, you need internet connection. \n\n Please check your connection and try again.

You haven't completed the setup for the Recovery Code you just used to recover your wallet. 

 Please visit the Security Center to back up your wallet with a new Recovery Code, and make sure you finish the setup this time. 

 As soon as you create a new Recovery Code, the current one will be invalidated.
You haven\'t completed setting up this Recovery Code. You should have a newer one. Please, find it and try again.
Your credentials (email and Recovery Code) don\'t match.
Please make sure you enter the Recovery Code that recovers the wallet using the email placeholder.
When receiving funds, you have to choose between using the Bitcoin Network or the Lightning Network. In the future, you won\'t need to do it anymore (learn more).
Default to show a bitcoin address. The most widely accepted and reliable way of transacting in bitcoin.
Default to show a lightning invoice. Lightning payments can be faster and cheaper, but some services don\'t support them yet.
🧪 Experimental. Default to a unified QR code that encodes both a bitcoin address and a lightning invoice. Many services don\'t support this unified format yet.
🧪 Unified QR codes are experimental (learn more) \n\n
The Bitcoin Network is congested. Fees are high, and confirmation times are slow.

Some features of the wallet rely on Bitcoin transactions and are affected by the current status of the Bitcoin network.
This includes on-the-fly channel creation, swap-out (payment to bitcoin addresses) and swap-in (deposit funds to the wallet using a bitcoin address). When the network is congested and mining fees are very high, those features will be more expensive, slow, and may be temporarily disabled.
Payments over Lightning are not affected.
